nodes.text: The Chopani sector was a sector of the galaxy located in the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the Void of Chopani, and was situated to the north-west of the Raioballo sector, with the planet Lah'mu found on the edge of the sector. It was also close to Dantooine, the Myto's Arrow hyperlane, and other sectors such as Veragi, Clacis, Myto, and Relgim.
